mapper.select: select * from baby_info bi inner join class_info ci on bi.class_id=ci.class_id where ci.user_id=#{userId} and bi.baby_status=1 order by baby_no

select count(bi.baby_id)sum from class_info ci inner join baby_info bi on ci.class_id=bi.class_id inner join baby_attendance ba on bi.baby_id=ba.baby_id where ci.user_id=#{userId} and ba.attendance_date=#{currentDate}
